context: The Irish Design Engineering and Advanced Manufacturing (IDEAM) Research Institute, led by Dr John Cosgrove, is focused on the research and development of data-driven solutions for Industry. With core expertise in Engineering, Energy, Electronics, Informatics and Manufacturing, IDEAM is a comprehensive, multi-disciplinary institute focused on the development of excellence in research, collaborative research projects and regional training & skills that can deliver impactful research and innovation.The Research Institute has an extensive industry support base across Ireland, is currently collaborating on 24 industry-based research projects, and is directly supported by a strong ecosystem of 65 actively engaged companies who have contributed to the definition and growth of this research area.
question: Why is the Irish Design Engineering and Advanced Manufacturing (IDEAM) Research Institute focused on the development of data-driven solutions for Industry?
answer: focused on the development of excellence in research, collaborative research projects and regional training & skills that can deliver impactful research and innovation
